name: The Show is Over It
description:
The Show is Over It is a challenging platform game with caricatured characters. Players must climb levels filled with quirky obstacles and surprises These unexpected events add excitement to the game. With vibrant graphics and clever level design, it offers a visually stimulating and enjoyable experience. It's ideal for those seeking an exciting challenge with a humorous twist.

* Jump to the top.
* Listen to the funny characters cheer you up or be cruel to you.
* Fall back to the beginning of it all.
* and repeat.
* try not to get scared.
* Your soul is the one trying to escape.
* Only by jumping to the top will you free yourself.
* Monty, Peko peko and Charlotte are waiting for you, have fun with them.

Can you reach the top and be free?
